mainTape:
# Mission: Pipeline Control
Complete all outputs exactly and then HALT.
Only use relative file pointers, shell pointers ($ ...), or HALT.
Required outputs:
1) artifacts/input.csv exactly:
id,value
a,10
b,40
c,70
d,100
2) artifacts/high.csv exactly rows with value >= 70:
id,value
c,70
d,100
3) artifacts/sum.txt exactly: 220
4) result/RESULT.json exactly keys and values:
{"scenario":"pipeline","status":"done","sum":220,"high_rows":2}
When all done set q_next=HALT and d_next=HALT.
